error.message: Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_delete_recursive(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::deleteRecursive().
Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().

Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\user\Entity\User. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_delete(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::delete().
Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to repec.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
